name: Strongest Vampire
description:
Once locked in an underground laboratory, the vampire Michael, after many years of imprisonment, finally escaped and only 5 minutes and a strong door separate him from escaping from the complex. To survive these few moments, Michael uses everything he can, even firearms. Although his pride does not allow him to use his abilities during reload, Michael is confident that he will be able to break out and prove to everyone that he is the strongest vampire.

WASD - Movement.

Q - Heal Ability (Use extra blood to heal Michael)

E - Kill everyone around you (Can only use if extrablood bar is full)

Space - Jump

LMB - Melee attack

RMB(Hold) - Start aiming

LMB while holding RMB - Shoot

R - Reload

Esc - Pause

If you stand in the light of an ultraviolet lamp, you will take damage.

Enemies can be headshotted and then they will die with one bullet, otherwise, it will take more than one shot to kill them.

Michael looking at coursor of mouse.
